title: 2Bed/2Bath Nestled In the Heart of Forbes Creek, $500 Move-In Special!
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 908 Sq.
Experience top-flight class and community in one convenient location at The Preserve at Forbes Creek.
Situated in the heart of Kirkland’s South Juanita neighborhood, The Preserve at Forbes Creek boasts desirable amenities and spacious layouts that are ideal for any stage of your life.
Our sleek, sophisticated one, two, and three bedroom apartments – ideally positioned with easy access to I-405 and State Route 520 – are a perfect complement to your busy life.
At The Preserve at Forbes Creek, you’ll be close to the best of Kirkland, including The Village at Totem Lake, the Google campus, and the Kirkland waterfront.
Call today to visit and see The Preserve at Forbes Creek for yourself.

Stainless Steel Appliances*, Private Balconies or Patios, Plush Carpeting, Washer/Dryer, Walk-In Closets*, Custom Maple Cabinetry, Outdoor Storage Unit, Granite Counter Tops, Gorgeous Views, Vaulted Ceilings*, Dishwashers, Fireplaces, Hardwood Style Flooring*, Garages Available

Onsite Management, Onsite Maintenance, Abundant Parking, 3 Sparkling Swimming Pools (1 Indoor, 2 Outdoor), Lush & Serene Gardens, Carport Parking, Health Club-Style Fitness Center, Paved Walking Paths, Online Bill Payment, Basketball & Tennis Courts, 2 Jacuzzi's (1 Indoor, 1 Outdoor), Package Concierge, Cyber Cafe, WiFi Available, Dedicated Covered Grilling Areas, Playground, Conference Room & Individual Computer Workstations
For more information about our pet-friendly apartments for rent in Kirkland, get in touch with the experts at The Preserve at Forbes Creek.
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
